channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes up and down this road are getting so dangerous wirh no room to move to avoid them, 26th January
item.description:
Both directions up and down this road at least 8 potholes need repairing and have done for months this rain has made them worse and when we have had rainfall so dangerous you cannot see the potholes, cannot avoid them now and will cause damage to cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 26th January
item.description:
Give and take 28 days please repair x1 chipped kerb stone 80x100x45mm with concrete fillet (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, many reported weeks ago, none have been marked for repair., 26th January
item.description:
Innumerate potholes on Tobyfield Road from Tobyfield Close to Church Road. The entire surface is not fit for purpose.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tobyfield Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 26th January
item.description:
Give and take 28 day carriage way pothole 450x270x35mm tarmac parch stats required (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole causing damage to tyres, 26th January
item.description:
Can't miss it on road, managed to swerve to avoid but very dangerous. Please fix asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole at edge of road, 26th January
item.description:
Traveling AWAY from Cleeve there is a very deep hole at the edge of the road - approx location inidcated on the map
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 26th January

item.title: Several large potholes in centre of road, 26th January
item.description:
Several large pothoes in centre of Pecked Lane close to the junction. OUtside Houses 61-65
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55,57, Pecked Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road defects x6 major potholes and poor surfacing., 26th January
item.description:
Poor road surfacing and potholes causing nearby houses to vibrate / shake when large lorry's are frequently passing to a new build housing site in Winchcombe. The road has heavy traffic daily and needs to be repaired without delay. Previous poor quality patch repairs have become detached and washed away. Some deeper than 75mm and road sunken in location.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gretton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pot hole, 26th January
item.description:
Has torn my tyre. I tried to call the emergency number a few times last night as the hole is so deep, but the number rang out. This pot hole has been there for over a week and nothing has been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken and Damaged Drainage infrastructure and surfacing., 26th January
item.description:
Surfacing surrounding a key surface water sewer has become degraded and damaged. Surface water is now eroding the bank and vehicles are using this area which is now unsurfaced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gretton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing audible sound too loud/soft problem, 26th January
item.description:
Box no. TS-021 - TL pedestrian crossing is leaning over from contact with a vehicle. Could potentially catch large vehicles trying to get past. Crossing is still fully operational
Report on FixMyStreet
